title: Political positions of Joe Biden
added: A long-term rider and supporter of [[Amtrak]], Biden has been referred to as "perhaps its most famous advocate"; during his 2020 campaign, Biden said that, if elected, his administration would "spark the second great railroad revolution" and move to [[Railroad electrification in the United States|electrify Amtrak trains]].<ref name=Verma>Pranshu Verma, [https://www.nytimes.com/2020/10/24/us/biden-amtrak-covid.html Biden, an Amtrak Evangelist, Could Be a Lifeline for a Rail Agency in Crisis], ''New York Times'' (October 24, 2020).</ref> He also voiced support for 2,000 Amtrak workers furloughed due to Trump administration budget cuts, although he did not take a specific position on Amtrak personnel and service reductions.<ref name=Verma/>
